TopicTitle: KerbQuake Maintainer [Edit: delete me before my shame is known]

Articles.Content:
**Edit:**  I am a moron who hasn't played 1.0 yet and didn't realize this is now stock ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

my apologies for taking your time

[KerbQuake](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98583-0-25-KerbQuake-continued-v1-2-1-Reactive-Camera-Shakes-while-IVA-2014-10-29)

This wonderful mod hasn't been updated since .25 and it really adds a great level of immersion to IVA missions and once you have played with it it is painful to not use it ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

So I would like to formally request for a skilled plugin developer to pick this mod up, please ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I suspect there will need to be major changes to the code to get it working in 1.0 as it references atmospheric things for a lot of the shaking. Also comparability with nuFAR, RealChutes and DRE would (for me at least) be a must have.

The current version worked ok in .90 but it had some reported issues with RealChutes, also for me it had a major bug when using unmanned vessels, NRE spam that would crash the game, however I believe it was a plugin conflict as it didn't happen on a stock install, however I have yet to track down which dll was causing the conflict (heavily modded install).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T19:51:05Z" title="05/06/2015 07:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Akira\_R**
But it's now more less stock has it.
